captions.text:
I feel like this is gonna 
be a peaceful game.

Does it stand for anything,
or is it just P.T.?

Perfect Trees.
That's what it's called.

Pretty Terrifying.
Is it a scary game?

I just have a really weird feeling
that this is gonna be extremely scary.

I hate scary.
I don't want it to be scary.

(reading) "Watch out.
The gap in the door...

(reading) "The only me is me.
Are you sure the only you is you?"

(gasps) Oh my god.
I moved the thing
and I thought I was a bug.

That's a cockroach.
Wait, two cockroaches.

Oh, god. This is gonna be 
a scary-ass game, isn't it?

Graphics are good.
It looks like a real house.

(radio) The day of the crime, 
the father went to the trunk...

(radio) This brutal killing took place
while the family was gathered at home...

- Oh, wait. No.
- (radio) ..on a Sunday afternoon.

This looks like a party.
This is a murder scene.

Can I just go?
I just wanna go home!

I don't wanna--
I don't wanna do this.

(radio) The day of the crime, 
the father went to...

- ..the trunk of his car...
- They're saying things.

..retrieved the rifle, and shot his wife
as she was cleaning up the kitchen.

Fun radio noises.
It's talking about shooting your wife.

(radio) His six year old daughter
had the good sense to hide in the bathroom,

but reports suggest he lured her out
by telling her it was just a game.

(radio) The mother, who was shot 
in the stomach, was pregnant at the time.

Oh, okay, you're gonna make me go
down into the dark basement.

Of course. Of course.
Why would I think anything else?

- (door creaks)
- Did I just go through here?

I just went through a door
and I came back the same way.

Okay, this house is owned 
by a married couple.

(gasps) Oh my god!
That scared me!

So I have to go through 
the same fricking door again,

When you see a pounding door
that means open it.

Nope. Nope.
Can't go in, I guess.
What the heck do I do?
Whoa. So R3's to zoom in.
Oh, so is it teaching me to zoom in?
I don't think that door was open before.
The thing's not on the floor anymore.

- (loud thumps)
- What's going on? I feel like some--
Oh, now that door is open. Okay.

- (creaking)
- I can't! Ugh! I can't do it.
Come on, it's just a video game.

(gasps) Ew. No.
I don't do cockroaches.

- I hear a baby crying in that room.
- (baby cries)

I can't just look in there.
I can't just--
That ran some shivers down my spine.
Oh. I'm gonna have nightmares for a week.

- (door creaks open and shuts)
- Back in the same room.
Not gonna lie. A little on edge right now.

Ew, that's an evil laugh.
No thank you.

Oh, god...don't make me do this.
Oh my god.

This is one hand mode right now.
I can't. Ugh, oh my god.
I might start crying right now.

There's gonna be something else
around this corner.

Have I ever told you guys
how much I hate being scared?

There's a flickering light.
Oh, it's a bathroom.

Oh, a flashlight.
Can I pick it up?

(gasps) I can't do it!
I really--oh my god!

- Oh no! No, no, no.
- (dripping water)

I'm sure the door shut.
I just--(groans)

Somebody is watching me 
while I'm showering.

Oh my god.
Oh my god!

- (doorknob rattles)
- Oh, someone's trying to get in.

Something's coming and I don't 
wanna know what it is!
My heart is really pounding right now.

The door just opened.
I'm gonna go out.

I like scary games like this though
because there's a story behind it
and you have to search for answers.

Door's open.
Here we go again.

I'm the biggest baby 
when it comes to this stuff, honestly.

I still have no idea 
the premise of this game.

- (radio) ...Opened the door today--
- Other than scaring the crap outta you.

I hear weird sounds.
Weird sounds.

It's over here.
Is there something in the wall?

Am I dead?
I hope I am.

- I just want this over.
- (ripping of flesh)
I think I died. I lost?

That was horrible!
Why would you make me do that?!

I thought it was over.
I was so happy.
Is this how many days he was in here?
That's like a brain or something in there.

- (gruff voice) I can do nothing but walk.
- It's talking!

(gruff voice) Watch out for the door.
It's...a separate reality.

- Are you sure the only you--
- Is you? Oh.

It's the lines from the beginning.
Interesting.
Still have no idea what that means.
And out the door to the same thing?
Pretty sure the lady is killed.
Did he gouge her eye out or something?
It's like a puzzle game, okay.

Blue X, X-Men.
It's Nightcrawler's blue.
Oh my...no, no, no, no, no!

- (door creaks)
- And it gouged out the eye. Okay.
I don't know how much more I can take.

(reading) "Forgive me, Lisa.
There's a monster inside of me."
Climb out that window and we're home free.

(reading) "I can hear them calling...
to me from...where?"

(radio) After killing his family, 
the father hung himself with a garden hose.

The father hung himself?
I don't wanna look up.

That's a refrigerator...hanging 
from the ceiling, pouring blood.
Well, then. I'm just gonna keep going.

- (door creaks)
- And now this is red.

- (baby wails, squeals)
- I hear a struggling baby,
like a baby in panic mode.

I feel like I have to go back in here now
'cause the baby's crying.
Do I have to check up on you?

- (baby cries loudly)
- Wait, you're not making that cry.

Oh my god.
It sounds like it's upstairs.

- So there's another baby in the house.
- (baby's wailing intensifies)
I think the baby's in the refrigerator.
What to do? What to do?
I don't know what to do!

(reading) "I can hear 
them all calling me from..."

That's what the guy's voice is on. 
The phone!

(gasp) Oh, I get it.
The letters are going away.

Going from one side to the other.
It's a new clue.
So the word "hell" is in the word "hello".
There was missing words from this one.
Okay, so we're gonna go boom.
Now I gotta go to the--

Oh my goodness.
What's going on?

I just heard someone laughing.
That's not chill.

- (baby shrieks, laughter)
- Who plays games like these?

You hear a door unlock,
you solve the puzzle.

I'm going down. Okay.
Let's go down to hell!

I just wanted this game 
to be Peaceful Trees.

Stay tuned for more P.T. 
here on the React Channel.

New gaming shows every Sunday.
Be sure to subscribe.

Comment below other games
you'd like us to play.

Hit that like button if you enjoyed us
screaming our heads off for P.T.
